document_data.name: Alatos Thuibuld
document_data.mainbody:
'''Alatos "Ravenscar" Thuibuld''' was the leader of a thieves' guild in [[Baldur's Gate]] during the midâ€“14{{th}} century [[DR]].

{{Quote|I simply must apologize for the manner of my thieves. I suppose a thieves' guild must keep a measure of malice about it, but it does tend to put a cloud over introductions.|Alatos, to a new potential asset.}}
document_data.Activities: Ravenscar directed the thieves of the Baldurian guild to aggressively ruin or otherwise suppress any would-be rivals that emerged in the city's underground.
document_data.History: In the {{YearlinkName|1368}}, Alatos schemed with the [[Halruaan]] [[mage]] [[Resar]] to steal a number of [[material component]]s used in the construction of [[Halruaan skyship]]s from the estate of [[Oberan]] within the city.
